headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FISHER, ROBERT MILLER "FISH," BOB'S OLDEST PARTNER IN CRIME AND BEST FRIEND

keywords.value: FISHER, ROBERT MILLER "FISH," BOB'S OLDEST PARTNER IN CRIME AND BEST FRIEND
keywords.name: persons

snippet: FISHER--Robert Miller "Fish," Bob's oldest partner in crime and best friend. Your wisdom, integrity and friendship are gifts we will all cherish forever. Our hearts and love go out to Linda and the family. Judy, Lisa, Gail, Matt, Darren and the kids (your second family) 1/3
lead_paragraph: FISHER--Robert Miller "Fish," Bob's oldest partner in crime and best friend. Your wisdom, integrity and friendship are gifts we will all cherish forever. Our hearts and love go out to Linda and the family. Judy, Lisa, Gail, Matt, Darren and the kids (your second family) 1/3
